about_the_game:
Legend has it that there is a treasure in the west, which can make people immortal and invincible on the earth! Countless people joined this treasure hunting game, the weak were killed suddenly, and the winner took all. Will you be the final winner?

Game features
- Integrate the farming system into the auto chess mode, plant trees and make wine, incubate and forge, and experience the joy of alternative business development
- Freely match character equipment, organize backpacks and adjust positions, explore the best skill combination effects, and create ecstasy for fans
- Fantasy oriental background, ancient legends and legendary magic weapons.
- No time limit. You can think about your choices at your own pace.

name: Brawl To The West Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and above
  • Processor: x64 or x86
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: This is a fun auto battler game. Choose and equip magic weapons, cultivate amazing plants and monsters. Build your team to dominate the west!
